{% set terms_exist = doc.terms and (doc.terms|striptags).strip() or "" %} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}
LETTER OF OFFER
Dear   {{doc.get_formatted("applicant_name")}}

Congratulations!!

We are pleased to offer you an Employment with SEQURETEK IT SOLUTIONS PVT. LTD.,
based on the interview discussions you had with us and your application submitted to us.
Details of the terms and conditions of offer are as under:
  1.    You will be designated as {{doc.get_formatted("designation")}} and will be based at our {{doc.branch}} Office.
  2.    Your date of commencement of Employment will be on or before {{doc.get_formatted("offer_date")}}
  3.    You would be entitled to receive compensation and benefits (Fixed+Variable Pay of Rs {{doc.get_formatted("yearly_ctc")}}/- per annum).
  4.    Your employment would be subject to the Terms & Conditions, mentioned in your appointment letter, which will be issued to you on your joining.
  5.    You will be on probation for a period of {{doc.get_formatted("probation_period")}} months from the date of Joining.
  6. Please bring along the below listed documents / details on your day of joining.

    1.   Date of Birth proof certificate (Copy of passport / birth certificate)
    2.   Original Academic Certificates (all from 10th to Highest)
    3.   Pan Card
    4.   Address Proof
    5.   3 passport size photographs (Recent)
  7.    Kindly sign a copy of this letter as a token of your acceptance of this offer. This offer is valid for 1 business days from the date on this letter.



Looking forward to a long and mutually beneficial career with us.


Yours truly,
For SEQURETEK IT SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED,

Authorized Signatory

html:
{% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

‘NON-DISCLOSURE’ AND ‘NON-SOLICITATION’ AGREEMENT BETWEEN SEQURETEK IT SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED AND ITS EMPLOYEES





  1. As an employee of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, a company incorporated in Mumbai, India, under the Companies Act 2013 and in consideration of the compensation now and hereafter paid to me, I will devote my best efforts to furthering the best interests of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited. During my employment, I will not engage in activity that:
    1. Conflicts with the business interests of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, including without limitation, any business activities not contemplated by this agreement.
    2. Occupies my attention so as to interfere with the proper and efficient performance of my duties at Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, or
    3. Interferes with the independent exercise of my judgement in the best interests of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited.
  2. As used herein, the “business” of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited means the development, marketing and support of software, hardware, products and services for business and professional use including operation systems, application programmes, Internet-related websites or e-commerce solutions, as well as books and hardware for the microcomputer and Internet marketplace.

Recognition of Absolute Ownership

  1. I hereby recognise and admit that Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited is the absolute, unrestricted and exclusive owner of the confidential or proprietary technical, financial, marketing, manufacturing, distribution, or other technical or business information or trade secrets of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, including without limitation, concepts, techniques, processes, methods, systems, designs, clients, cost data, computer programs, formulae, development or experimental work, work in progress, customers and suppliers as well as software for business and professional use application programmes, operating systems, internet websites or e-commerce solutions, books, hardware and information for the microcomputer and internet marketplace used by me in the course of my employment with Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited.





(Signature of Employee)

I agree that I shall not in any manner whatsoever, represent and/or claim that I have any interest by way of ownership, assignment or otherwise in the same.

  1. In this agreement, all confidential and/or proprietary information belonging to and/or in possession of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, which is received, accessed, and/or used by me during the course of my employment with Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, shall include without limitation, such information received from Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, its customers and/or any entity in which Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited holds or controls more than 50% of the equity stock thereof and/or is entitled to vote for the election of directors.
  2. Non-Disclosure.
    1. At all times, whether during my employment or thereafter, I will not disclose to anyone outside Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited nor use for any purpose other than my work for Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited:
      1. Any confidential or proprietary technical, financial, marketing, manufacturing, distribution or other technical or business information or trade secrets of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, including without limitation, concepts, techniques, processes, methods, systems, designs, circuits, cost data, computer programs, formulae, development or experimental work, work-in-progress, customers and suppliers.
      2. Any information Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited has received from its clients/others which Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited is obligated to treat as confidential or proprietary.
      3. Any confidential or proprietary information which is circulated within Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited via its internal electronic mail system, intranet or otherwise.
    2. I will also not disclose any confidential or proprietary information to anyone inside Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited except on a “need-to-know” basis. If I have any questions as to what comprises such confidential or proprietary information or trade secrets, as to whom, if anyone inside Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, it may be disclosed, I will consult with my Functional Head at Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited.





(Signature of Employee)

Assignment of Inventions

  1. I hereby assign exclusively to Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited all my right, title and interest in and to any all inventions, discoveries, designs, processes, procedures, content, developments, improvements, copyrightable material, and trade secrets (collectively herein known as and referred to as “Inventions”) that I solely or jointly may conceive, write, encode, develop, or reduce to practice during the period of time for which I am in the employment of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited. I will make prompt and full disclosure to Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited of any inventions, and if for any reason the assignment pursuant to this clause is not effective, will hold all such inventions in trust for the sole benefit of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited.
  2. I hereby waive and quit claim to Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, any and all claims of any nature whatsoever that I now or hereafter may have for infringement of any patent resulting from any patent applications for any inventions so assigned to Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited.

Exceptions

  1. My obligation to assign shall not apply to any invention about which I can prove that:
    1. It was developed entirely on my own time;
    2. No equipment, supplies, facilities, services or trade secret of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited was used in its development; and
    3. It does not relate:
      1. Directly to the business of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited,
      2. To the actual or demonstrably anticipated research or development of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited,
      3. It does not result from any work performed by me for Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited.
  2. Excluded and Licensed inventions. I have attached hereto, a list describing all inventions belonging to me and made by me prior to my employment with Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited that I wish to have excluded from this agreement. If no such list is attached, I represent that there are no such inventions. If in the course of my employment at Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, I use in or incorporate into a Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited product, programme, process or machine, an invention owned by me or which I have an interest, Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited is hereby granted and shall have an exclusive royalty-free, irrevocable, worldwide license to make, have made, use and sell that invention without restriction as to the extent of my ownership or interest.

Application for Copyright and Patents

  1. I will execute any proper oath or verify any proper document relevant to the carrying out of the terms of this agreement. If, because of my mental or physical incapacity or for any other reason whatsoever, Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited is unable to secure my signature to apply for or to pursue any application for any Indian or foreign patent or copyright covering inventions assigned to Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited as stated above, I hereby irrevocably designate and appoint Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited and its duly authorised officers and agents as my agent and attorney in fact, to act for me and in my behalf and stead, to execute and file any prosecution and issuance of Indian and foreign patents and copyrights thereon with the same legal force and effect as if executed by me. I will testify at Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited request and expense in any interference, litigation or other legal proceeding that may arise during or after my employment.

Third-Party Information

  1. I recognise that Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited has received and will receive confidential or proprietary information from its customers as well as third parties subject to a duty on Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited’s part to maintain the confidentiality of such information and to use it only for certain limited purpose. During the term of my employment or thereafter, I will not disclose such confidential or proprietary information to anyone except as necessary in carrying out my work in Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited and consistent with Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited agreement with such customers or third parties. I will not use such information for the benefit of anyone other than Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited or such third party, or in any manner inconsistent with any agreement between Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited and such third party of which I am made aware.





(Signature of Employee)

Presumption of Breach

  1. In the event of the possession, access and or use of the confidential or proprietary technical, financial, marketing, manufacturing, distribution or other technical or business information or trade secrets of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, including without limitation, concepts, technique’s processes, methods, system’s, designs, clients, cost data, computer programmes, formulae, development or experimental work, work-in-progress, customers and suppliers as well as software for business and professional use, application programs, internet websites, e-commerce solutions, books, hardware and information for the microcomputer and internet marketplace by any other third party with whom I may have a nexus, it shall be presumed, unless proved to the contrary, that such information has so come to the possession of the third party on account of breach of this agreement by me.

Term of Employment

  1. I acknowledge that my employment will be of indefinite duration and that either Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited or I will be free to terminate this employment relationship at will and at any time with or without cause and in accordance with the Master Copy of the Employee Handbook signed by me with Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited on __________, 20__. I also acknowledge that any representations to the contrary are unauthorised and void, unless contained in the said employment agreement signed by an officer of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited.

Return of Materials

  1. At the time I leave the employment of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, I will return to Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited all papers, drawings, notes, memoranda, manuals, specifications, designs, devices, documents, diskettes, CD’s, DVD’s. Tapes, DAT Drives and any other material on any media whatsoever, containing or disclosing any confidential or proprietary technical or business information. I will also return any and all keys, pass cards, ID cards or other property belonging to Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited.

Non-Solicitation

  1. While employed at Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited and for a period of twelve months from the date of termination of my employment, I will not induce or attempt to influence directly or indirectly, any employee at Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited to terminate his employment with Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited or to work for me or any other person or entity.

Indemnity form Loss of Personal Property

  1. I agree that Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited will not be responsible for any loss, disappearance, or damage to my personal property on Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited premises, or if applicable, on residential premises (including apartments or temporary housing) subsidised by Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited. I hereby release, discharge and hold Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited harmless from any and all claims relating to loss of, disappearance, or damage to such personal property.

Equitable Relief

  1. I acknowledge that any violation by me under this agreement, and/or any obligation of like nature, will cause irreparable injury to Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, and Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited shall be entitled to extraordinary relief in any court in India, including, but not limited to, temporary restraining orders, preliminary injunctions, and permanent injunctions, without the necessity of posting bond or security.

Attorney Fees

  1. If court proceedings are required to enforce any provision of this agreement, the prevailing party shall be entitled to an award of reasonable and necessary expenses of litigation, including reasonable attorney fees.

Entire Agreement

  1. I agree that this agreement shall be governed for all purposes by the laws of India and that venue for any action arising out of this agreement shall be the courts of India. If any provision of this agreement shall be declared excessively broad, it shall be construed so as to afford Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited the maximum protection permissible by law. If any provision of this agreement is void or is so declared, such provision shall be severed from this agreement, which shall otherwise remain in full force and effect. This agreement sets forth the entire agreement of the parties as to the subject matter hereof and any representations, promises, or conditions in connection therewith not in writing and signed by both parties shall not be binding upon either party, the terms and conditions of this agreement shall survive termination of my employment.

HAVING READ AND FULLY UNDERSTOOD THIS AGREEMENT, I have signed my name on this _____ day of ____________, 20__.



(Signature of Employee)

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Contract Period, Pricing, Payment Terms"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
  • The Sequretek Percept XDR & NG SIEM Product Contract Term will be for minimum 1 year.
  • The Yearly Invoice for Percept XDR & NG SIEM will be submitted on as soon as Purchase Order is issued for the same.
  • Payment is Net 30 days, upon submission of Sequretek's yearly invoice.
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Terms and Conditions"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
  • All prices are in currency INR, excludes local taxes GST.
  • Purchase Order or email approval to invoice based on Statement of Work, is required to begin the contract.
  • The yearly Percept XDR & NG SIEM fees starting with second year and beyond, will have a 10% increase every year.
  • Project Plan and SOC Org contact matrix, any documentation would be shared before start of the contract.
  • At the end of first year, the contract will automatically renew for continuous services and would require renewal PO by the end of 1 year.
  • During the term of this contract and any extension of it, and for a further period of 12 months thereafter, BoAt agrees not to approach directly, or indirectly or through third parties solicit or hire for employment those personnel directly of Sequretek.
  • The commercials quoted above are based on the scope defined. Any change in the scope of work will necessitate changes in the commercials via proper Change Request processes as agreed by Sequretek and BoAt SPOC.
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Contract Assumptions & Exclusions"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

Assumptions

  • In case travel is required to any location other than BoAt wherein remote installation cannot be carried out, accommodation, travel charges and other allowances will be additional and as per Sequretek travel policy. The same will be shared and mutually agreed for these services' purpose.
  • If necessary, and mutually agreed upon, BoAt will provide Sequretek with access to your facilities outside shift hours and on Sunday/holidays.
  • Licensing, Annual maintenance / subscription and OEM support for all software, hardware and other log sources used in BoAt environment for purposes managing the environment will be BoAt's responsibility. Sequretek will provide training resources only as a part of this service. This would include trial ware and any new software required/procured by BoAt.
  • Additional software tools may not be required for Sequretek to manage the environment. Sequretek team will declare any tool/ additional software that are brought in BoAt environment for the purpose of managing the environment. The same will be brought and used (in case needed from time to time) only after approvals from BoAt and will be licensed in case procured from any third party.
  • To assist Sequretek in delivering a successful engagement, BoAt will provide the following to help:
    • Access to relevant technical Information on BoAt IT environment.
    • Provision of computers for the implementation resource.
    • Access to relevant business information, including (not necessarily limited to): IT Organizational Charts and escalation matrix, Role and Responsibility map, Business Processes that require integration with InfoSec environment, Policies and Procedures, Critical Success Factors, etc. Detailed network topology and IP details for all the log sources with their subnets. Admin
"}]

LETTER OF OFFER
Dear   {{doc.get_formatted("applicant_name")}}

Congratulations!!

We are pleased to offer you an Employment with SEQURETEK IT SOLUTIONS PVT. LTD.,
based on the interview discussions you had with us and your application submitted to us.
Details of the terms and conditions of offer are as under:
  1.    You will be designated as {{doc.get_formatted("designation")}}and will be based at our Mumbai/Bangalore Office.
  2.    Your date of commencement of Employment will be on or before {{doc.get_formatted("offer_date")}}
  3.    You would be entitled to receive compensation and benefits (Fixed+Variable Pay of Rs {{doc.get_formatted("yearly_ctc")}}/- per annum).
  4.    Your employment would be subject to the Terms & Conditions, mentioned in your appointment letter, which will be issued to you on your joining.
  5.    You will be on probation for a period of {{doc.get_formatted("probation_period")}} months from the date of Joining.
  6. Please bring along the below listed documents / details on your day of joining.

    1.   Date of Birth proof certificate (Copy of passport / birth certificate)
    2.   Original Academic Certificates (all from 10th to Highest)
    3.   Pan Card
    4.   Address Proof
    5.   3 passport size photographs (Recent)
  7.    Kindly sign a copy of this letter as a token of your acceptance of this offer. This offer is valid for 1 business days from the date on this letter.



Looking forward to a long and mutually beneficial career with us.


Yours truly,
For SEQURETEK IT SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED,


Authorized Signatory

format_data:
{"header":"

Appointment Letter

{{ doc.name }}

","sections":[{"label":"","columns":[{"label":"","fields":[{"label":"Custom HTML","fieldname":"custom_html","fieldtype":"HTML","html":"
{{doc.get_formatted("appointment_date")}}

Mr. {{doc.get_formatted("applicant_name")}},
Mumbai.

Subject: Appointment as '{{doc.get_formatted("subject")}}’

Dear {{doc.get_formatted("applicant_name")}},

Thank you for your interest in Sequretek IT Solutions Pvt. Ltd. Sequretek helps customers manage their IT security and Data Management needs by delivering solutions, services and product Development so that customers stay protected and complaint across their digital information asset. We are headquartered in Mumbai, India and have our registered office at 304, Satellite Silver, Marol Naka, Andheri Kurla Road, Andheri (East), Mumbai – 400059, India.

We are pleased to offer you the above appointment as a {{doc.get_formatted("designation")}} with the Company. In this capacity you will be reporting to Pritish Bharambe.

This offer is subject to your acceptance of the following terms and conditions:

1. Designation: Associate Consultant, or other such position as per the organization structure and as determined by Sequretek from time to time.
2. Date of Commencement: 5 th September, 2022. If for any reason you are unable to join on the said date, please inform Sequretek official immediately.
3. Location: The normal place of work will be Mumbai. You may be required to work at any of Sequretek’s premises or at the premises of its customers, clients, suppliers or associates within India (or abroad) from time to time. You agree to work in accordance with the Company’s scheduled time. You recognize that your duties may require you to engage in travel on behalf of the Company and that flexible hours must be maintained based upon the needs of the customers. You expressly agree to accept such reasonable travel and hours of work without additional compensation to the extent allowed under local labor law.
4. Previous Employment: If you are employed, you are expected to join the Company only after your present employer formally relieves you. You are required to submit the relieving letter from your present employer to the Company. The Company will not be liable for any consequences arising out of any of your previous employments. You hereby agree that you are not subject to any terms or conditions (whether contractual or otherwise) which restrict or may restrict your ability to carry out your duties for the Company or any Group Company.
5. Background Check: As a policy the Company conducts background checks of all new employees. This appointment is conditional upon the Company receiving satisfactory results from a background check, which shall include without limitation – interviewing past and current employers and verifying education and qualifications. For business requirements, you may also be required to undergo a criminal check. The Company shall have the right to terminate your services anytime without notice or payment in lieu of notice, if the information provided by you at the time of the interview or as part of your application or resume is found to be false or misrepresented. Employment with the Company is contingent upon verification of your personal and professional references.
6. Duties and Responsibilities: You shall perform the duties and responsibilities as set by the Company and that are consistent with your position within the Company. You must act in the best interests of the Company, serve it faithfully and diligently and comply with all legal requirements applicable to you and all lawful directions issued to you by the Company from time to time. You agree that since you work full time for the Company, you shall not at any time during the term of this Agreement, without the prior written consent of the Company, be engaged, employed, concerned or interested, directly or indirectly, in any other employment, business or occupation that may conflict with your duties to the Company.
7. Working Days & Hours: Our work days are Monday – Friday from 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. However, in case of customer requirement or the requirement of our company, you may have to work for 6 days a week, i.e., from Monday – Saturday.
8. Salary: You will receive an annual total salary of Indian Rupees 3, 50,000 (Three Lakhs Fifty Thousand Only), payable in monthly installments. Such salary shall be subject to all applicable withholding income tax requirements. The breakdown of your salary structure is as per
Annexure 1.
You will be under probation for the first 6 months, without any leave entitlement.
9. Annual Leave: You will receive annual leave in accordance with the Company’s annual leave policy.
10. Public Holiday: You shall be granted public holidays as listed for office employees. List of holidays for each calendar year will be published by the company by April every year.
11. Termination: The Company shall have the right to terminate this employment at any time, without prior notice, if the Company is of the opinion that you have been guilty of misconduct or have become otherwise unfit for employment in any way whatsoever. In the event that your employment with the Company is terminated for any other reason, the Company will provide 30 days’ notice (or such greater amount of notice as may be required by law) or payment in lieu of notice. During probation if you voluntarily terminate your employment with the Company, you must provide us with 75 days’ written notice. Post Confirmation if you voluntarily terminate your employment with the Company, you must provide us with 75 days’ written notice. For the avoidance of doubt, you will remain the Company’s employee during any such period and may not carry out any work for any third party. During any period of notice you may be required by the Company, in its absolute discretion, not to contact its employees, customers or suppliers, not to attend at you place of work at any time and not to perform any duties for the Company or to perform only such duties, specific projects or tasks as are assigned to you expressly by the Company, for such period and at such place or places (including, without limitation, your home) as the Company deems appropriate, provided that you will be entitled to receive full pay and benefits (excluding any commission or bonus) during such period. During the termination and for 6 months thereafter, you will not directly or indirectly solicit, deal with or contact the current or potential customers of the Company or any Group Company.
12. Effect of Termination: Upon termination of this by reason of misconduct or because you have otherwise become unfit for employment in accordance with clause 12, you shall not be entitled to any compensation, severance pay, or indemnity whatsoever.
13. Policies of the Company: You are subject to the policies and rules of the Company as amended from time to time.

Dear   {{doc.get_formatted("applicant_name")}}

Congratulations!!

We are pleased to offer you an Employment with SEQURETEK IT SOLUTIONS PVT. LTD.,
based on the interview discussions you had with us and your application submitted to us.
Details of the terms and conditions of offer are as under:
  1.    You will be designated as {{doc.get_formatted("designation")}} and will be based at our Mumbai/Bangalore Office.
  2.    Your date of commencement of Employment will be on or before {{doc.get_formatted("offer_date")}}
  3.    You would be entitled to receive compensation and benefits (Fixed+Variable Pay of Rs {{doc.get_formatted("yearly_ctc")}}/- per annum).

html:
{{doc.get_formatted("appointment_date")}}

Mr. {{doc.get_formatted("applicant_name")}},
Mumbai.

Subject: Appointment as '{{doc.get_formatted("subject")}}’

Dear {{doc.get_formatted("applicant_name")}},

Thank you for your interest in Sequretek IT Solutions Pvt. Ltd. Sequretek helps customers manage their IT security and Data Management needs by delivering solutions, services and product Development so that customers stay protected and complaint across their digital information asset. We are headquartered in Mumbai, India and have our registered office at 304, Satellite Silver, Marol Naka, Andheri Kurla Road, Andheri (East), Mumbai – 400059, India.

We are pleased to offer you the above appointment as a {{doc.get_formatted("designation")}} with the Company. In this capacity you will be reporting to Pritish Bharambe.

This offer is subject to your acceptance of the following terms and conditions:

1. Designation: Associate Consultant, or other such position as per the organization structure and as determined by Sequretek from time to time.
2. Date of Commencement: 5 th September, 2022. If for any reason you are unable to join on the said date, please inform Sequretek official immediately.
3. Location: The normal place of work will be Mumbai. You may be required to work at any of Sequretek’s premises or at the premises of its customers, clients, suppliers or associates within India (or abroad) from time to time. You agree to work in accordance with the Company’s scheduled time. You recognize that your duties may require you to engage in travel on behalf of the Company and that flexible hours must be maintained based upon the needs of the customers. You expressly agree to accept such reasonable travel and hours of work without additional compensation to the extent allowed under local labor law.
4. Previous Employment: If you are employed, you are expected to join the Company only after your present employer formally relieves you. You are required to submit the relieving letter from your present employer to the Company. The Company will not be liable for any consequences arising out of any of your previous employments. You hereby agree that you are not subject to any terms or conditions (whether contractual or otherwise) which restrict or may restrict your ability to carry out your duties for the Company or any Group Company.
5. Background Check: As a policy the Company conducts background checks of all new employees. This appointment is conditional upon the Company receiving satisfactory results from a background check, which shall include without limitation – interviewing past and current employers and verifying education and qualifications. For business requirements, you may also be required to undergo a criminal check. The Company shall have the right to terminate your services anytime without notice or payment in lieu of notice, if the information provided by you at the time of the interview or as part of your application or resume is found to be false or misrepresented. Employment with the Company is contingent upon verification of your personal and professional references.
6. Duties and Responsibilities: You shall perform the duties and responsibilities as set by the Company and that are consistent with your position within the Company. You must act in the best interests of the Company, serve it faithfully and diligently and comply with all legal requirements applicable to you and all lawful directions issued to you by the Company from time to time. You agree that since you work full time for the Company, you shall not at any time during the term of this Agreement, without the prior written consent of the Company, be engaged, employed, concerned or interested, directly or indirectly, in any other employment, business or occupation that may conflict with your duties to the Company.
7. Working Days & Hours: Our work days are Monday – Friday from 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. However, in case of customer requirement or the requirement of our company, you may have to work for 6 days a week, i.e., from Monday – Saturday.
8. Salary: You will receive an annual total salary of Indian Rupees {{doc.get_formatted("yearly_ctc")}} ({{ frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.yearly_ctc or doc.yearly_ctc) }}), payable in monthly installments. Such salary shall be subject to all applicable withholding income tax requirements. The breakdown of your salary structure is as per
Annexure 1.
You will be under probation for the first 6 months, without any leave entitlement.
9. Annual Leave: You will receive annual leave in accordance with the Company’s annual leave policy.
10. Public Holiday: You shall be granted public holidays as listed for office employees. List of holidays for each calendar year will be published by the company by April every year.
11. Termination: The Company shall have the right to terminate this employment at any time, without prior notice, if the Company is of the opinion that you have been guilty of misconduct or have become otherwise unfit for employment in any way whatsoever. In the event that your employment with the Company is terminated for any other reason, the Company will provide 30 days’ notice (or such greater amount of notice as may be required by law) or payment in lieu of notice. During probation if you voluntarily terminate your employment with the Company, you must provide us with 75 days’ written notice. Post Confirmation if you voluntarily terminate your employment with the Company, you must provide us with 75 days’ written notice. For the avoidance of doubt, you will remain the Company’s employee during any such period and may not carry out any work for any third party. During any period of notice you may be required by the Company, in its absolute discretion, not to contact its employees, customers or suppliers, not to attend at you place of work at any time and not to perform any duties for the Company or to perform only such duties, specific projects or tasks as are assigned to you expressly by the Company, for such period and at such place or places (including, without limitation, your home) as the Company deems appropriate, provided that you will be entitled to receive full pay and benefits (excluding any commission or bonus) during such period. During the termination and for 6 months thereafter, you will not directly or indirectly solicit, deal with or contact the current or potential customers of the Company or any Group Company.
12. Effect of Termination: Upon termination of this by reason of misconduct or because you have otherwise become unfit for employment in accordance with clause 12, you shall not be entitled to any compensation, severance pay, or indemnity whatsoever.
13. Policies of the Company: You are subject to the policies and rules of the Company as amended from time to time.
14. Data Privacy: You expressly consent to the processing including collection and use within the Company’s group or third-party contractors storing such data on the Company’s behalf) of your personal data.
15. Conditions: This Agreement shall be interpreted and given effect exclusively in accordance with the laws of the India. The parties agree to submit to the jurisdiction of Indian Courts with respect to the adjudication of any dispute arising hereunder. Nothing in this Agreement shall operate to exclude or limit any liability for fraud.

This offer is valid for 5 business days from the date on this letter.

If you agree to the foregoing terms and conditions of your employment with the Company,
please indicate your acceptance by signing the acknowledgment below.

1.As an Contractor of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, a company incorporated in Mumbai, India,

     Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited. During my tenure, I will not engage in activity that:

            of my duties at Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, or

            of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited.
2.As used herein, the “business” of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited means the development,
            marketing and support of software, hardware, products and services for business and
            professional use including operation systems, application programmes, Contractoret-related
            websites or e-commerce solutions, as well as books and hardware for the microcomputer and
            Contractoret marketplace.
            Recognition of Absolute Ownership
1. I hereby recognise and admit that Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited is the absolute, unrestricted

            Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, including without limitation, concepts, techniques,

            during the course of my tenure with Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, shall include
            without limitation, such information received from Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, its
            customers and/or any entity in which Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited holds or controls
            more than 50% of the equity stock thereof and/or is entitled to vote for the election of directors.

Non-Disclosure.

1.At all times, whether during my tenure or thereafter, I will not disclose to anyone outside Sequretek
            IT Solutions Private Limited nor use for any purpose other than my work for Sequretek IT
            Solutions Private Limited:

            (a)Any confidential or proprietary technical, financial, marketing, manufacturing,
            distribution or other technical or business information or trade secrets of Sequretek IT
            Solutions Private Limited, including without limitation, concepts, techniques, processes,
            methods, systems, designs, circuits, cost data, computer programs, formulae, development
            or experimental work, work-in-progress, customers and suppliers.

            (b)Any information Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited has received from its
            clients/others which Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited is obligated to treat as
            confidential or proprietary.

            (c)Any confidential or proprietary information which is circulated within Sequretek IT
            Solutions Private Limited via its Contractoral electronic mail system, intranet or otherwise.

2. I will also not disclose any confidential or proprietary information to anyone inside Sequretek IT
            Solutions Private Limited except on a “need-to-know” basis. If I have any questions as to what
            comprises such confidential or proprietary information or trade secrets, as to whom, if anyone
            inside Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, it may be disclosed, I will consult with my
            Functional Head at Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited.


____________________
(Signature of Contractor)


      Assignment of Inventions.

1. I hereby assign exclusively to Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited all my right, title and interest in
            and to any all inventions, discoveries, designs, processes, procedures, content, developments,
            improvements, copyrightable material, and trade secrets (collectively herein known as and
            referred to as “Inventions”) that I solely or jointly may conceive, write, encode, develop, or
            reduce to practice during the period of time for which I am in the tenure of Sequretek IT
            Solutions Private Limited. I will make prompt and full disclosure to Sequretek IT Solutions
            Private Limited of any inventions, and if for any reason the assignment pursuant to this clause is
            not effective, will hold all such inventions in trust for the sole benefit of Sequretek IT Solutions
            Private Limited.

2.I hereby waive and quit claim to Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, any and all claims of any
            nature whatsoever that I now or hereafter may have for infringement of any patent resulting
            from any patent applications for any inventions so assigned to Sequretek IT Solutions Private
            Limited.

Exceptions

1. My obligation to assign shall not apply to any invention about which I can prove that:

            (a)It was developed entirely on my own time; and

            (b)No equipment, supplies, facilities, services or trade secret of Sequretek IT Solutions
            Private Limited was used in its development; and

            (c)It does not relate:

                        (i)Directly to the business of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited,

                                                or

                        (ii) To the actual or demonstrably anticipated research or development of Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited,

                                                and

                        (iii)It does not result from any work performed by me for Sequretek IT Solutions
                        Private Limited.

2. Excluded and Licensed inventions. I have attached hereto, a list describing all inventions belonging
            to me and made by me prior to my tenure with Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited that I
            wish to have excluded from this agreement. If no such list is attached, I represent that there
            are no such inventions. If in the course of my tenure at Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited, I
            use in or incorporate into a Sequretek IT Solutions Private Limited

{"header":"

Appointment Letter

{{ doc.name }}

","sections":[{"label":"Body","columns":[{"label":"","fields":[{"label":"Custom HTML","fieldname":"custom_html","fieldtype":"HTML","html":"
{{doc.get_formatted("appointment_date")}}

Mr. {{doc.get_formatted("applicant_name")}},
Mumbai.

Subject: Appointment as '{{doc.get_formatted("subject")}}’

Dear {{doc.get_formatted("applicant_name")}},

Thank you for your interest in Sequretek IT Solutions Pvt. Ltd. Sequretek helps customers manage their IT security and Data Management needs by delivering solutions, services and product Development so that customers stay protected and complaint across their digital information asset. We are headquartered in Mumbai, India and have our registered office at 304, Satellite Silver, Marol Naka, Andheri Kurla Road, Andheri (East), Mumbai – 400059, India.

We are pleased to offer you the above appointment as a {{doc.get_formatted("designation")}} with the Company. In this capacity you will be reporting to Pritish Bharambe.

This offer is subject to your acceptance of the following terms and conditions:

1. Designation: Associate Consultant, or other such position as per the organization structure and as determined by Sequretek from time to time.
2. Date of Commencement: 5 th September, 2022. If for any reason you are unable to join on the said date, please inform Sequretek official immediately.
3. Location: The normal place of work will be Mumbai. You may be required to work at any of Sequretek’s premises or at the premises of its customers, clients, suppliers or associates within India (or abroad) from time to time. You agree to work in accordance with the Company’s scheduled time. You recognize that your duties may require you to engage in travel on behalf of the Company and that flexible hours must be maintained based upon the needs of the customers. You expressly agree to accept such reasonable travel and hours of work without additional compensation to the extent allowed under local labor law.
4. Previous Employment: If you are employed, you are expected to join the Company only after your present employer formally relieves you. You are required to submit the relieving letter from your present employer to the Company. The Company will not be liable for any consequences arising out of any of your previous employments. You hereby agree that you are not subject to any terms or conditions (whether contractual or otherwise) which restrict or may restrict your ability to carry out your duties for the Company or any Group Company.
5. Background Check: As a policy the Company conducts background checks of all new employees. This appointment is conditional upon the Company receiving satisfactory results from a background check, which shall include without limitation – interviewing past and current employers and verifying education and qualifications. For business requirements, you may also be required to undergo a criminal check. The Company shall have the right to terminate your services anytime without notice or payment in lieu of notice, if the information provided by you at the time of the interview or as part of your application or resume is found to be false or misrepresented. Employment with the Company is contingent upon verification of your personal and professional references.
6. Duties and Responsibilities: You shall perform the duties and responsibilities as set by the Company and that are consistent with your position within the Company. You must act in the best interests of the Company, serve it faithfully and diligently and comply with all legal requirements applicable to you and all lawful directions issued to you by the Company from time to time. You agree that since you work full time for the Company, you shall not at any time during the term of this Agreement, without the prior written consent of the Company, be engaged, employed, concerned or interested, directly or indirectly, in any other employment, business or occupation that may conflict with your duties to the Company.
7. Working Days & Hours: Our work days are Monday – Friday from 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. However, in case of customer requirement or the requirement of our company, you may have to work for 6 days a week, i.e., from Monday – Saturday.
8. Salary: You will receive an annual total salary of Indian Rupees {{doc.get_formatted("yearly_ctc")}} ({{ frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.yearly_ctc or doc.yearly_ctc) }}), payable in monthly installments. Such salary shall be subject to all applicable withholding income tax requirements. The breakdown of your salary structure is as per
Annexure 1.
You will be under probation for the first 6 months, without any leave entitlement.
9. Annual Leave: You will receive annual leave in accordance with the Company’s annual leave policy.
10. Public Holiday: You shall be granted public holidays as listed for office employees. List of holidays for each calendar year will be published by the company by April every year.
11. Termination: The Company shall have the right to terminate this employment at any time, without prior notice, if the Company is of the opinion that you have been guilty of misconduct or have become otherwise unfit for employment in any way whatsoever. In the event that your employment with the Company is terminated for any other reason, the Company will provide 30 days’ notice (or such greater amount of notice as may be required by law) or payment in lieu of notice. During probation if you voluntarily terminate your employment with the Company, you must provide us with 75 days’ written notice. Post Confirmation if you voluntarily terminate your employment with the Company, you must provide us with 75 days’ written notice. For the avoidance of doubt, you will remain the Company’s employee during any such period and may not carry out any work for any third party. During any period of notice you may be required by the Company, in its absolute discretion, not to contact its employees, customers or suppliers, not to attend at you place of work at any time and not to perform any duties for the Company or to perform only such duties, specific projects or tasks as are assigned to you expressly by the Company, for such period and at such place or places (including, without limitation, your home) as the Company deems appropriate, provided that you will be entitled to receive full pay and benefits (excluding any commission or bonus) during such period. During the termination and for 6 months thereafter, you will not directly or indirectly solicit, deal with or contact the current or potential customers of the Company or any Group Company.
12. Effect of Termination: Upon termination of this by reason of misconduct or because you have otherwise become unfit for employment in accordance with clause 12, you shall not be entitled to any compensation, severance pay, or indemnity whatsoever.
13. Policies of the Company: You are subject to the policies and rules of the Company as amended from time to time.
14. Data Privacy: You expressly consent to the processing including collection and use within the Company’s group or third-party contractors storing such data on the Company’s behalf) of your personal data.
15. Conditions: This Agreement shall be interpreted and given effect exclusively in accordance with the laws of the India. The parties agree to submit to the jurisdiction of Indian Courts with respect to the adjudication of any dispute arising hereunder. Nothing in this Agreement shall operate to exclude or limit any liability for fraud.

This offer is valid for 5 business days from the date on this letter.

If you agree to the foregoing terms and conditions of your employment with the Company,
please indicate your acceptance by signing the acknowledgment below.
